Package lib.homies.framework.command.annotations

Annotation Interface SubCommand

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(METHOD) public @interface SubCommand
Annotation to mark a method as a subcommand handler. Methods annotated with this must reside within a class annotated with Command.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    value
    The name or pattern of the subcommand (e.g., "help", "set <value>").

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String[]
    aliases
    An array of aliases for the subcommand.
    String
    description
    A brief description of the subcommand.
    String
    permission
    The permission node required to execute this subcommand.
    String
    permissionMessage
    The message to send if the player lacks the required permission.
    boolean
    playerOnly
    Whether this subcommand can only be executed by a player.
    String
    playerOnlyMessage
    The message to send if a non-player tries to execute this subcommand when playerOnly is true.
    String
    usage
    The usage message for the subcommand.

  • Element Details

    • value

      String value
      The name or pattern of the subcommand (e.g., "help", "set <value>").
      Returns:
      The subcommand name or pattern.

    • aliases

      String[] aliases
      An array of aliases for the subcommand.
      Returns:
      An array of subcommand aliases.
      Default:
      {}

    • description

      String description
      A brief description of the subcommand.
      Returns:
      The subcommand description.
      Default:
      ""

    • usage

      String usage
      The usage message for the subcommand.
      Returns:
      The usage message.
      Default:
      ""

    • permission

      String permission
      The permission node required to execute this subcommand.
      Returns:
      The permission node.
      Default:
      ""

    • permissionMessage

      String permissionMessage
      The message to send if the player lacks the required permission.
      Returns:
      The permission message.
      Default:
      "&cYou do not have permission to execute this command."

    • playerOnly

      boolean playerOnly
      Whether this subcommand can only be executed by a player.
      Returns:
      true if player-only, false otherwise.
      Default:
      false

    • playerOnlyMessage

      String playerOnlyMessage
      The message to send if a non-player tries to execute this subcommand when playerOnly is true.
      Returns:
      The message to send.
      Default:
      "This command can only be run by a player."
